location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Coll 35/50(1) 'Diplomatic wireless service: transmission of telegrams to UK High Commissioners at New Delhi and Karachi'

physicalDescription.extent: The papers are arranged in approximate chronological order from the rear to the front of the file. There are notes within the file. The notes are arranged chronologically and refer to documents within the file; they give brief description of the correspondence with a reference number, which refers back to that correspondence in the file.

Foliation: the foliation sequence (used for referencing) commences at the front cover with 1, and terminates at the inside back cover with 14; these numbers are written in pencil, are circled, and are located in the top right corner of the recto side of each folio.

mods.abstract: The file concerns the transmission of telegrams to the UK High Commissioners at New Delhi and Karachi.The file contains correspondence between the UK High Commissioner at New Delhi, the UK High Commissioner at Karachi, the Commonwealth Relations Office, and the Foreign Office.
